vocabInfos.lsjDefs:
Ἐσλεί (Rec. 'Ἐσλί, see WH, Notes, 155), ὁ,
Esli, an ancestor of Jesus: Luk.3:25.†
(From Abbott-Smith. LSJ has no entry)
vocabInfos.mediumDef:
A man of the tribe of Judah living at the time ofExile and return, only mentioned at Luk.3.25;
son of: Naggai (G3477);
father of: Nahum (G3486)
§ Esli, "Yahweh sets apart"
Esli, (Proper name), indeclinable, Lk. 3:25*
vocabInfos._zh_tw_Definition:
以斯利 这个陽性專有名詞在希伯來文的意思是 "耶和華所留的"
拿該的兒子，耶穌家譜中一位祖先 (路 3:25)
vocabInfos._zh_Definition:
以斯利 这个阳性专有名词在希伯来文的意思是 "耶和华所留的"
拿该的儿子，耶稣家谱中一位祖先 (路 3:25)
